src:
Data dan Fakta Premier League: Aston Villa vs Liverpool
01 Nov 2019, 15:47 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pemimpin klasemen Liverpool akan main tandang melawan tim promosi dan peringkat 15 Aston Villa pada pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/20, Sabtu (02/11/2019). Berikut beberapa data dan fakta yang melatarbelakangi pertandingan di Villa Park ini.
Dalam laga tandang terakhirnya melawan Aston Villa di Premier League, pada musim 2015/16, Liverpool menang telak 6-0 lewat gol-gol Daniel Sturridge, James Milner, Emre Can, Divock Origi, Nathaniel Clyne, dan Kolo Toure.
Liverpool menang 5 kali dalam 8 laga terakhirnya melawan Aston Villa di semua kompetisi (M5 S1 K2).
Liverpool selalu menang dalam 5 laga tandang terakhirnya melawan Aston Villa di Premier League.
Liverpool selalu clean sheet dalam 3 laga tandang terakhirnya melawan Aston Villa di Premier League.
Liverpool selalu mencetak 2 gol atau lebih dalam 4 dari 5 laga tandang terakhirnya melawan Aston Villa di Premier League.
Liverpool sudah meraih 13 kemenangan tandang atas Aston Villa di Premier League (M13 S5 K6), lebih banyak dibandingkan melawan tim-tim lain.
James Milner telah mencetak 2 gol dan 2 assist dalam 4 laga terakhirnya melawan sang mantan klub Aston Villa di Premier League.
Scroll terus ke bawah untuk statistik yang lebih lengkap.
text:
Premier League Data and Facts: Aston Villa vs Liverpool
Nov 01 2019, 15:47 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Liverpool league leaders will play away against promotion team and ranked 15th Aston Villa in the 11th week of the 2019/20 Premier League on Saturday (02/11/2019). Here are some data and facts behind this match at Villa Park.
In their last away match against Aston Villa in the Premier League, in the 2015/16 season, Liverpool won a landslide victory 6-0 with goals from Daniel Sturridge, James Milner, Emre Can, Divock Origi, Nathaniel Clyne and Kolo Toure.
Liverpool won 5 times in their last 8 matches against Aston Villa in all competitions (M5 S1 K2).
Liverpool have always won in their last 5 away games against Aston Villa in the Premier League.
Liverpool have always kept clean sheets in their last 3 away games against Aston Villa in the Premier League.
Liverpool has always scored 2 or more goals in 4 of its last 5 away games against Aston Villa in the Premier League.
Liverpool have won 13 away wins over Aston Villa in the Premier League (M13 S5 K6), more than against other teams.
James Milner has scored 2 goals and 2 assists in his last 4 matches against former club Aston Villa in the Premier League.
Scroll down for more complete statistics.
